TEXT: Some #yHydrologist cards are tied to a completely separate card. When a #ySwappable card is in your hand, you can hover or hold it with your mouse and press the #ySwap key (default space, configurable) to switch the card to its #yPaired card.
LABEL: Swappables

TEXT: Some cards care about another card's #ySubtype. Every #yHydrologist card, except for strikes and defends, have a #ySubtype assigned to them, either #yIce, #yWater, or #ySteam. To tell these subtypes apart, there are unique visual indicators.
LABEL: Subtypes
